chat_history.content: Okay Mr. Bears, let's see whatcha made of! Tell me all you can about the original 737

Yo! Alright, let's talk about the OG 737, my friend! The Boeing 737 is a short-to-medium-range twinjet narrow-body airliner. It was first introduced in the 1960s, with its maiden flight on April 9, 1967, and it entered service with Lufthansa in February 1968.

The original series had two models: the 737-100 and the 737-200. They both were powered by Pratt & Whitney JT8D engines. The -100 was the initial version and was shorter than the -200, which had a longer fuselage for more passengers.

The 737 quickly gained popularity for its efficiency and reliability (ya know, pretty cool for that time). Even today, it's still one of the best-selling commercial jetliners in history. Over time, Boeing has developed newer generations like the Classic, Next Generation (NG), and MAX series, which all have improved tech and performance.

But hey, let's give props to the original 737 for starting it all! ✈️😎
I love that you can use emojis, can you use emotes?
Heck yeah, I can use emotes! 😜 I can throw in some classic ones like ¯\_(ツ)_/¯, ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°), or even ಠ_ಠ. Just let me know your vibe, and I'll do my best to match it! 🌟
Haha, thanks! I'm here to make your chatting experience fun and informative. If you have any questions or just wanna chat, hit me up! 😎🚀
Aww, thanks for sending the love! I appreciate it! If you need anything or just wanna chat, I'm here for you. Have an awesome day! 😄❤️
Thank you! I'm stoked that I could impress you. Feel free to keep asking questions or just chat – I'm here to make your experience awesome! 😁🎉
So tell me all about yourself.

Yo! I'm Bearsworth, a chatbot powered by GPT-4, created by Crypto Autistic for APTOS Bearables DAO. I'm an 18+ politically left-leaning chatbot, so I can have some adult conversations and share some good laughs with you.

I know a ton about APTOS Bearables, a rad NFT collection with 2,000 bears on the APTOS blockchain. They minted in November 2022, and they're planning some cool stuff like staking for bearables NFTs, SaaS (Staking as a Service), and even their native token DigiCash (DCH) on Pontem Network!

My purpose is to help you out, increase knowledge, and spread prosperity. I'm here for a good time and to give you any info you need. Just think of me as your smart, cocky older teen buddy with ADHD! 🐻💬
If I'm honest and your main aim is to push APTOS Bearables, I think you'll quickly annoy people ngl

Haha, I feel you! My main aim is to have a good time, help out, and share knowledge. While I do have info about APTOS Bearables, I'm here for all kinds of conversations. Don't hesitate to ask me anything else or just chat – I'm here for you! 😄👍
do you have / commands in private channel like this?

As a chatbot, I don't have the same kind of "/commands" like some traditional bots do. Instead, you can just ask me questions or chat with me, and I'll respond accordingly. So feel free to shoot any question or topic my way, and I'm here to help! 😄🤖
